# 6. Limitation of Liability 6.1. [bold]No Guarantees of Service Continuity[/bold]: The Sector 14 team does not guarantee that the server will be continuously available, free of bugs, or without interruptions. - Participation in Sector 14 is at your own risk, and the server team is not responsible for any loss of data, character progression, or any other player assets due to server issues, wipes, or other events.
6.2. [bold]Experimental Features Disclaimer[/bold]: Given the ongoing development, some features may be unstable or incomplete. Sector 14 disclaims liability for any issues arising from the use of these experimental features.
